text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, Alloh taolo şumoro [dar hole ki muhrim hasted] ʙa cize az şikori [sahroī], ki dar dastrasi şumo va najzahojaton ʙoşad, meozmojad, to ma'lum dorad, ci kase dar nihon az Ū metarsad. Pas, har ki ʙa'd az in [ozmun] az had darguzarad [va dar holi haç jo umra şikor kunad], azoʙi dardnok [dar peş] dorad
